content.detailedDescription:
Sutherlin, or- for the past few months my sister in law has seen what she described as bright orangish balls of light, there was three of them flying in a formation, one of them shot out a red flare/laser of some kind that they saw fall to the ground. i dismissed her claims about this because i had not see it. she told us the occurrence of them has been almost 1 per week. i did a google search and found that others had seen the same thing, someone even posted a video of them to youtube. we went down there for my little nieces birthday party, my wife, sister inlaw and her husband were outside. i heard a yelling, "come outside the lights are here again." so i ran out and looked at what they where pointing at. from my view point i saw the same 2 lights/orbs that they saw. they weren't blinking at all, just very steady. orange in color. the brightness and size of them reminded my of the size of a planet when viewed at night. the spacing between the two lights was about a fingers width when held at arms length. the brightness of the two orbs, was not sharp around the edges, it was soft. the appeared to hover, i didn't see much motion, they then moved away heading due east, very fast, and the lights faded out. there speed was the same, the spacing was the same, one of the objects faded out a little before the other one. the first time my sister inlaw saw the orbs of light they were the size of a street light. there are many many many, people in the town of sutherlin, or that are seeing the lights. after seeing the lights i looked up my flight24 app and there was no commerical aircraft for miles around. the really spooky part about it is the orbs, look almost like stars in the sky, until they move. there is no sound at all. 
if there was one place to start looking for ufo's this would be the place.
content.summary: Formation of orange orb moving in formation bright and then faded out to nothing.

content.detailedDescription: It was summer and me and some other family had just finished playing a game called "ghost in the graveyard". i was about 10 years old and my cousin (the other witness) was about 14. my aunt had called the others inside and me and my cousin were on the opposite end of the cemetery from the mobile home still walking back. he was about 20 to 30 feet from me. i had stopped and was waiting on him as he walked toward me. i was facing south. suddenly he put his hand up pointing at the sky and said "what's that, look !" i turned around to look north in the direction of his point and saw a large circular disc coming toward us and it went almost over our heads. it was about 100 feet of the ground and about 25 to 50 feet in diameter. it was a light gray color and had the letters "usaf" on the bottom of it on one side and an alpha numeric (letters and numbers) on the other side. at the time it happened i did not know what these letters meant (i was only around 10 years old). i said "it's a flying saucer". after it flew by us it stopped in mid air, hovered for a few seconds and descended to land on the other side of wooded area south of the cemetery. it made an electric humming noise with a slow pulse and a air rushing noise. not like a heavy jet noise but, it may have hade jet air. after it landed me and my cousin ran over to the fence of the woods and stopped. we could see 2 dark silhouettes get out of it and then saw a red light. one of them appeared to be holding a red light. my cousin went over the fence and thru the woods. i stayed put. he came back, covered in mud, and said it was 2 men in "jump suits". they didn't see him. we went inside and told my aunt and she said we was crazy. she didn't think it possible. i wrote the letters "usaf" on a piece of paper and said that was written on it. she still did not believe it. she would not let us go back and look. we then got her to let us go to my grandmother's house just up the long driveway from there. my father, uncle and some older cousins were playing a late night card game with the tv on in the next room. we told them about it and they didn't believe it. then, after about a half hour maybe we heard a loud sound outside. we said "that must be it" and one of them ran outside. he came back in and said it's just a helicopter. early the next morning we ran outside of the trailer to go see if it was still there. in front of the cemetery gate was the town marshal blocking the entrance and two air force trucks in the cemetery. at the end of the cemetery was a air force helicopter. the marshal told us that the helicopter had engine trouble and had to be repaired. the thing is that the craft we saw was not a helicopter. it was circular planeform disc and had the letters "usaf" in big bold black letters on it's bottom. the helicopter was air force blue with the letters "u.S. air force" on it's side. obviously, not the same craft. i know now what the letters mean and this sighting caused me to join the air force when i was 18. it is my opinion that this was connected to something like project silverbug or maybe even was silverbug being relocated. i believe it landed and needed a repair and that the helicopter came from grissom afb to fix it and the pilots may have seen us and that's why they kept the helicopter there as a cover story.
content.summary: Claypool disc landing

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to barn to check on animals. it was very dark, some starlight, this is a very remote area with limited ground lights. there were two blue white lights, arranged like headlights but much larger, floating slowly out of the canyon and into the valley, at about 300 ft. elevation, and maybe 300 yds. away, seeming to follow the road. the lights blinked occasionally, there were no port/starboard lights or strobes. i was thinking maybe it was a heliocopter, so i turned off the engine of my car, but there was no discernible noise, other than wind. it was very, very windy. the lights moved closer, and i would estimate that they moved at about 10-15 mph. they stayed parallel and in the same plane. i pulled out my binocculars (which i keep in the car for observing my cattle, etc.), but couldn't make out any shape or profile. as the lights passed behind my house, i reversed the car and decided to follow it. the lights proceeded to the south-southeast slowly, and when i pulled out of our driveway, i was parallel to it, and pulled into the road to pursue it. it was to the east of my location, still moving very slowly and very low, over the hills. i kept my speed at about 25 mph, thinking that i could intercept it out on the highway. and i thought to myself, "and then what?" and began to be a little intimidated. 
    after i had traveled about .30 mile on the dirt road, the lights veered directly east and disappeared behind a low hill. i have lived here for 30 yrs. and figured out about where i might intercept it, so i went to the highway (nm hwy 78) and proceeded east for about 4.5 miles, but didn't see it any longer. i drove up to a higher vantage point, but didn't see it anywhere.
i felt very nervous suddenly and started to tremble. i had had another "encounter" in 1992, but this time, i feel a lot more intimidated, and though the curiosity and desire to pursue is there, i am quite uncomfortable. i am very tired, but not sure i can sleep tonight. as curious as i am, i wish this hadn't happened. i hope all my cows are there in the morning....
content.summary: Two large blue-white lights moving very slowly, out of canyon into valley, no sound

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside smoking a cigarette, facing west, i turned my head to look north and saw a large fireball go quickly across the sky from east to west. the time was between 9 pm and 11 pm the sun had just set and there was still some evening glow to the sky. it was at an angle of descent of about 25 to 40 degrees. it was increasing in light intensity and then then blew apart into multiple pieces. it was moving in my estimate 500 to 2,500 mph. it looked like it was about 2 miles distance to it north of town. from my view in southeast of town, it exploded over north west of town. this took about 2 seconds. it was obviously on fire. it left a long fire and smoke trail behind it which took about 1 minute or so to dissipate. after the explosion some of it continued going straight and burnt up but, some of it fell downward in a cannonball like trajectory. it did not look like any of it remained from burning. my first thought was that a plane just came burning down from the sky and exploded, but after taking a minute to relax i think it was probably a space rock. i later noticed it on the news that a sonic shock wave hit kokomo and that another report was made to the police of a plane crash. although, i could see a darker area in the flames it was impossible to tell what was on fire.
content.summary: Kokomo fireball

content.detailedDescription: In los fresnos and in the south texas there have been many ufo sightings here in lf there's pulsing colored triangle light like at 2 am every week this and last month a buzz is made by it it hurts and is annoying my dogs start to howl vibration also occurs it feels odd then the power goes out for like about 6 seconds phone and radio don't work right police were called they have no explanation they are checking every night in our neighborhood but still no answer.Also my aunt in brownsville has seen them she said that her arm hurt and we checked it and we definitely felt something there wasn't a cut or anything she went to the doctor for an xray. they said she had to have something in there they said it looked like a chip .Her daughter, my cousin, as a child has seen these too she said that her dolls fell from the buzz and vibration she was with my aunt in bed with her grandma and her twin sister she saw lots of light and it was just 2 am she said that there was this dark thing with hair like in braids she said it was definitely not human next to it was a little girl they looked back and she pretended to be sleeping she said they appeared to be looking for something in her toy chest as soon as the lights were gone she woke her mom up and they went to check it out the toy box was thrown and was very cold nothing but the family picture was taken the frame broken so cold
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Pulsing lights , vibration, buzz, police are checking at night

content.detailedDescription: Driving north bound on uphill rode towards whiteriver,as, i looked towards the west in the direction of canyon day community and i noticed a orange light above the mountain which is roughly 6000 feet in elevation, the road i was traveling turned west into a small valley and around a 200 foot hill, i lost sight of the light and i drove south to the community on highway 73,but light was gone when i arrived in the area, when i asked questions i was told it was a frequent event
content.summary: Orange glow above 6000 ft mtn..Others witnessed prior months before

content.detailedDescription:
In the 23 years i have been living in this area  i have seen these particular craft only 3 times twice in june of 2013 and tonight.  aprox.
30 craft hung in the sky over my head spaced out over the whole area. i dont know the reason for their presens. but  it is not for a good reason if it was like last year. they appeared shortly after the long string of strange ufo's the first week of june 2013. it has been relatively quiet since then. no idea what they are doing up there but will keep my eyes open. these disc large sized mother ones. they  were showing a row of lights around the outside of the middle making no mistake to identify them  if you know what to look for. i tried contacting joe palarmo missouri's main mufon investigater and his cohort debbie but no one answered their phones this late at night. i promised to report on this sight so the full detials. i think they were looking for something in particular but i dont know what. a high speed air craft in the area possibly the one the call the aurora,not for sure though and the one  i call the sherrif a triangular craft with a trobing red light on the rear of the craft like a police car. the aurora craft has been in our area twice one when a opponeent craft was distroyed and tonight. anyonr interestrf in more details fill free to call me tomorrow i am going bed after i  post this sighting.
content.summary: Disc shaped objects  high in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
A few years ago myself my uncle and friend were in my driveway working on my car when we starting talking about aliens. it was summertime around sunset clear blue sky's.  looked up in the sky and seen the black sphere travelling satellite like. at first sight i thought i saw orange flare glow on half the sphere. it was about 50 to 100 ft over my house. no noise. no sound . black hole.  it just stayed on its course. til we couldn't see it. wasn't travelling fast at all. 10-20. kmphr. i just googled what i saw today after telling people i seen this. now i see that others have too. wow please tell me what's up!
my uncle looked scared. never ever seen such a thing.  from my belief beyond our technologies.
i saw it never seen it again
tried taking pics bad camera phone picture not clear
content.summary: 3 of us in my yard. look up and see black sphere asked each other "what's that?" it travel 100 ft over my house. til it was too far to see.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 7 a.M. april 27, 2014 when i pulled up to my work.  the first thing i noticed after i parked my vehicle was how pretty the sky looked, so i grabbed my phone and proceeded to take a picture at that moment i noticed the birds were like flying in all different directions as if something had startled them, it all happened right when i was going to take a picture, so i waited a minute put the phone back up to take the picture then i noticed this object on my phone first thing i thought was there was something on the lense so i turned the phone over to look and there was nothing there and i looked back up and there it was it hovered for like a split second then started moving very fast from the right to the left.  i was like that is not a bird and diffenately not a balloon.  i took a couple pictures.  i thought wow, i should have put the phone on video, but it happened so quickly.
content.summary: Flitting ufo

content.detailedDescription: We had gathered for the evening at my neighbor's house, sitting outside in the front lawn. there were six adults and two children in our group.I noticed a bright light approaching from the northeast. i was sitting in such a way that i was facing west, looking over the roof top of my neighbor's house. my neighbor's daughter had noticed that my eyes were fixed on the sky, so she too looked up and observed the light. by this time all eyes were now on the light which was flying close and over my neighbor's house. we initially thought it was a plane, however,the light was bright, white, and steady; no secondary, pulsating, or blinking lights observed. no sound of any kind was heard as it traveled in a steady straight path. we were all asking each other what it was we were looking at,since we could not discern a pulsating or secondary light, as on a commercial plane, because we live close to an airport (hobby airport) and also to a former military base that now is used by the u.S. coastguard, nasa,private companies, and now has reserve military facilities. it is called ellington field, formerly ellington air force base. as soon as it cleared the big tree in front of my house(next door from where we were sitting), the light suddenly diminished to black and instantly, two dim lights appeared to shoot out of the center, in opposite directions. one light traveled north, in a straight path,at a constant speed and elevation.  this light held steady in its illumination. it actually looked like a satellite traveling across the sky. i'm an avid star gazer, since childhood and still own my telescope that i've had for about 36 years, so thru my star gazing, i have seen a few, what i think at least, are satellites, in my life time. i witnessed the light traveling north, but then i lost it in the glare of the street light down the block. we have a street light in front of my house, but the large tree in front of my house blocks a good portion of it, as many branches smother it. eventually, with the aid of my neighbors, they told me where to look again so that i could see the light. by this time the light was traveling back in the direction it came from (from the split)and was eventually lost. since i focused on the "left" light,i did not see where the "right" light went to.
content.summary: Single  bright white glowing light, no sound, steady speed,constant elevation in straight path,light faded suddenly  then instantly two small dim lights shot out in opposite directions one flew north in straight path then south, other light unknown

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i witnessed 4 amber/orange red lights directly south of our gilbert home on monday (april 28 2014) evening. the lights seemed to be traveling from west to east over the san tan mountains viewed from our location. as a pilot i knew these weren't conventional aircraft due to the light color and configuration. we watched as they flew in formation for about 10 - 15 minutes then the lights seemed to flicker and fade out. the lights seemed to be away in the distance so no sound was observed.
content.summary: 4 amber colored lights appeared south of gilbert in the night sky flying west to east

content.detailedDescription:
It was spring of 1980.  i watched tv until the cable had gone off the air. 11pm appx.  everyone had fallen asleep, but i still was not tired.  it was storming very badly outside. lightening, thunder, and heavy rain. i had nothing better to do so i went to bed.  the bed was in the bedroom on the second floor next to a window overlooking a field next to the farm house.  

i layed in bed watching the storm through the window when i noticed that in the field next to the house were spheres of light.  there were appx 6-7 of them darting back and forth across this field in every direction possible.  i had never seen anything like it before or since.   these objects were appx 4 ft in diameter.  moving like pinballs in a pinball machine from one end of the field to the other.  once reaching the border of the field they bounced back changing direction then darting in a new direction until it reached the border again.  

i was 11 yrs old and i was amazed by what i was seeing.  so much so that i tried to wake others to witness this event.  i was unsuccessful at waking anyone.  i could not wake anyone no matter how hard i tried.  

i eventually fell asleep watching the spheres in the field.  i assumed it was a natural event and did no investigation the next morning in the field.  i wish i would have now but i was 11 and didnt no any better.  plus, i just figured it was something explainable.

we left grams that day and went back home to st. joseph, mo.  on that monday upon returning to school, i asked my science teacher about what i witnessed and he pretty much treated me as if i were lying about it.  
i knew right then that it was not a natural event that took place that night in leavenworth,ks.  

im 45 yrs old now and over the years i have read and taken interest into the ufo phenomenon.  i have never heard or read any other stories similar to mine.  

are there others who have witnessed such an event?  what did i see?  was it a natural phenomenon?  or other worldly? i would really like to hear other stories similar to this or at least a theory of what it was that i saw.
content.summary: Six or seven balls of light

content.detailedDescription: This incident took place in the summer of 1980, the exact date i do not recall. the time of night i do not recall but it was very late, maybe as late as 2:00 a.M. i was in livingston county near odell, illinois on a dark, clear, cloudless star filled night. there is absolutely no light pollution. iwas not under the influence of alcohol or drugs.   i was sitting on the hood of a car with another person looking up at the stars, which i love to do. i saw an object that looked exactly like a star; same size, same brightness, same distance away, for it was among the stars or so it appeared. it was the size and brightness as a large bright star. not one of those tiny ones and this one did not twinkle or change in any way. this object was moving at a continual and even speed, travelling from star to star. as soon as it would get near a star, looking as though it would crash into it, object would veer off at a right angle, or in another straight angle, and go to another star and repeat the process. object never slowed down, it kept up the same even pace the entire time i watched it.  i had no clue what this could be but it was mesmerizing.   other person did not care to be involved with even looking at object. iam counting him as witness but he wad so disinterested he may not have comprehended. the other witness is deceased.  the viewing went on for at least twenty minutes. ijust stopped watching it, it was still travelling. it did not go all over the sky, it kept to a very small area of the sky.  i was curious and fascinated and couldn't understand why the other person wasn't as interested but i was breaking up with him and he was morose.  the weirdest part of the story, is more than a year later i was describing this incident to my current boyfriend who is now my husband. his eyes grew wide and he told me he saw the same thing. he lived about eight miles from me, in dwight illinois. he said it was late at night during the same summer, same time of night.  he was so excited that he woke his 80 yr old mother who said it was a weather balloon lol. i have thought a lot about this over the years and it still eludes reasoning.
content.summary: Starlike object at continuous speed zig zagging from star to star

content.detailedDescription: My church group went to san carlos for a mission trip, march 14, 2014. after the long drive from phoenix, we stopped at the beach in san carlos to watch the sunset, before going to our hosts location, approx 7pm. the sunset was amazing, in the west was the sunset, and i turned around to the east to snap the moon aswell. it wasn't until i got home and started looking at my pics that i noticed a shadow in one of them, it could be anything, just hoping that someone else witnessed the "object", and can confirm what i got a picture of. i haven't disclosed this to anyone else in our group, i'm not aware of anyone else with a testimony to the image/event.
content.summary: I didn't notice the "object" while on the beach

content.detailedDescription: sitting on porch watching airplane in ne sky looked to se direction saw two red lights never seen anything like it before very bright red.
content.summary: Two red lights moving east to west

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room looking out the window (i thought i heard my husband pull into the driveway and wanted to check), i noticed two lights in the sky that were blinking red and blue, and occasionally turning green for a moment. i thought they might be helicopters looking for something or someone, so i watched them for a moment, and they started moving very strangely. they zipped around at various speeds, almost like they were chasing one another, then they both disappeared over the horizon. i kept watching for a few minutes until i decided they were gone. after about 10 minutes i decided to check again, and one was back! it hovered, then zipped, then floated downward, then zipped again, then it came very close and seemed to be directly overhead. by this time i'd gone outside to get a closer look. my husband had come home by then as well, and he said "it must be a helicopter or airplane." i asked him why there was a silent aircraft flying in such a weird speed/pattern over the suburbs at 10:30pm, and he had no answer. eventually the light flew away from us and disappeared, and i checked again frequently but never saw it again. i'm very skeptical of virtually all ufo sightings (i think there's a rational explanation 99.9% of the time), so i'm terrified that i have no explanation for this. someone suggested a kite with led lights, but it moved too great of a distance for that (in my opinion). maybe someone flying model airplanes at night for some reason?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw lights blinking red, blue, and occasionally green. there were 2 at first, then they both disappeared into the horizon, about 10 minutes later one ca,e back, hovered, zipped around, hovered some more, and then zipped away. speed changed frequently.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the front porch and had just turned to the north when i saw a huge green fireball trailing orange fire off of it streak on a low flat trajectory from east to west. it was probably no higher than 30 degrees in the sky at beginning, lowering to about 20 degrees, and covered aprox. 60 degrees of travel during sighting. it was so spectacular that i screamed through the sighting, so if it made any noise, i didn't hear it.  there were a few brighter flashes off of it as it passed.  it was the greenest green imaginable, and glowing like a blow-torch, and vibrant like green laser. it was a large ball, not a pinpoint of light. it lit the sky up around it for quite a ways.  though it passed behind trees, they seemed to disappear from its brightness.  i could not not really tell, bcause of obstacles,  whether it terminated or kept going on, but the flashes i saw were probably that in progress. 
i was hesitant at first to report to mufon what may be merely a meteor, but, as it would have to be copper that makes it burn green, it would have to be rare indeed.  after reading up on green fireballs (and this is my 3rd, one in 1971 while approaching the owyhee mountains in the southeast corner of oregon and said to be russian space debris )and the well known one over western washington, in the mid-2000's, and now. i found that these may be something other than a meteor, and that sightings have appeared in some quite unusual clusters in the same areas, and with some association with ufo activity.  therefore, i hope my report is of some use in this respect.  i did also report this to the american meteorological society on the night of.
content.summary: Huge green fireball trailing orange fire with low east to west trajectory

content.detailedDescription: In 1996 i had an e.C. 4 with greys. this event the night was only sightings. when i tried to film then the craft would not show up. several of my neighbors had the same problem. two days later, i awoke to the sound of my window unlatching and sliding itself open. then i saw a grey on my hallway staring at my girlfriend and i. when i screamed and tried to shake her awake but she could not be woken up. a second appeared behind him and i suddenly became paralyzed. they were about 4 or 5 feet tall, slender with large skulls and huge black egg shaped eyes. no nose although lizard life nostrils and no ears but ear canals. skin was rough in appearance. i don't remember anything else prior to waking up the next morning. i have had a small hole in my left arm since1996.
content.summary: Saw 2 that moved and vanished. 5 hrs later there were 5 staying still. unable to photo but i tried to.

content.detailedDescription: Oceanside ca. suburbs 5 miles east of coast.I was outside in my yard, about 830-840 pm turning off the bbq when i noticed something distorted out in the west sky, as it got closer i noticed it was big 50-60 feet  wide, then my patio blocked my view. so then i quickly moved for a better  view, to see a large dark v shaped object hovering, and moving quickly around 80 mph or so,, and maybe 60-100 feet over the tree lines. it headed  straight to me, and as it passed over head i can see the triangle v shape, with dim lights under the object, 3-4 round lights on one side, and the same on the other side yellowish orange underside only. it passed over, then lost site over the trees,, so i ran out the gate, to see a small glimpse of the object disappear to the west over the houses. i was shocked! but it was awesome!
content.summary: Trinangle dark shap with dim yellow red lights under. v shape. going east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were sitting on the patio of boulders, a restaurant in tempe, az, eating dinner when we both noticed a series of 7 pulsating orange and red orbs rising from the northern horizon, traveling almost directly south and following single file, somewhere around .5 miles equidistant from one another.  as they traveled south, they slowly gained altitude, and passed maybe 1 mile east of us before ascending into the clouds and disappearing. there was a brief pause of perhaps 1 minute, then another series of 7 orbs appeared from the same point on the horizon as the ones before. they followed the exact same path, staying equidistant from one another almost the entire time, until 2 orbs deviated from the path and went east and west just before ascending into the clouds in the same area as the ones before. there was another pause of about 1 minute, before one last orb, pulsating orange and red, rose from the same place, but seemed to go straight upward, then just before reaching cloud cover, it changed direction immediately and began moving southward. it ascended into the clouds in the same place about 1 mile east and just a little south of us that the others had.
all of the objects had a uniform, pulsating orange and red glow. they did not seem to have any distinguishable craft shape, it was like the lights were the entire object or the entire craft was glowing. they all seemed to have an orb shape with no distinguishable features.
there was an older british couple sitting behind us that also noticed the orbs from the beginning. the gentleman initially dismissed them as floating lanterns, but didn't mention that theory after the 2nd series of lights had appeared. after they had all disappeared, he looked at his wife and said, "well, i think we just saw our first ufo's".
i had seen one of the exact same orbs in the winter of 2012 and had been absolutely befuddled by what i had seen, so i was ecstatic to have had the opportunity to not only see another one, but 15 of them, and also with 3 other people. i filmed the end of both events, although the cell phone video doesn't do the real thing justice (the videos are on my old phone, and i can find them if requested).
overall, i felt, and the 3 other witnesses felt that there was no readily apparent explanation for what we saw. it/they were clearly not a helicopter, airplane, or blimp, which we see plenty of, due to our proximity to the phoenix airport. since the sightings, i've kept my eye on the skies, hoping for a repeat performance, but sadly, there's been nothing. i feel more frustration more than anything, in the sense that i have been unable to find any answers, but i'm grateful i got to see something that has made me ask so many questions.
content.summary: Series of 15 (in total) pulsating orange and red orbs moved from northern horizon southwards, ascended into clouds with two orbs deviating from path just before entering clouds

content.detailedDescription: I need to speak with someone. my wife and i have been dealing with a increasingly hostile group of ufo's. it's been going on for over 3 months. what started as an occasional sighting has turned into a nightly harassment that is gaining in intensity. now they are there almost every night. they are becoming more and more hostile to my attempts to make them go away and leave us alone. i need help asap. i have a lot of video.
content.summary: Bright multi colored orb

content.detailedDescription:
Spring of '89 or '90 (can't remember, but bit was one of those), around 4pm, coming home from town, driving down our mile long driveway i noticed something in the sky. i stopped, got out of my truck, and stood there and watched... this black triangle was just hanging there in the sky... hovering...It went slowly up and down about 4 or 5 times it's length, and then it just took off heading to the west towards a city.  from pretty much a stand still to completely gone almost instantly. for comparison, when passenger jets pass over our place it takes several minuets for the plane to disappear into the horizon.  this black triangle darted to the west and out of sight in about 1 second. 

i never told anyone at the time, didn't figure anyone would believe me. but after seeing a show on discovery channel explaining mufon, in which they talk about these black triangles spotted around the world in the late 80' to early '90's,  i figured i put my two cents worth in and finally tell someone what i saw.
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was in the open ground seeing stars ..I saw a star moving which is very bright ..Travelling from north east to south east . brightning in yellow colour ..During disapperence...It emitted red and blue light ..
content.summary: Saw an ufo star like travelling from north east to south east ...Suddenly disappeared emitting  red and blue light

content.detailedDescription:
Front of house walking my dog and staring up through an opening in the clouds at the stars (star gazing).
its bright yellow/white light speeding across sky.
because of its color and speed i knew right away what it was.
just a bright light making a wide 180 deg. arc and changing directions with speed just short of a shooting star.
was just awed by the sighting and all doubts of ufo's erased. very exciting.
it went across the opening of the clouds and disappeared behing more clouds.
content.summary: Went from sw to nw through clouds and saw it through opening in cloud much higher going back south

content.detailedDescription:
4/27/14 930p i was outside waiting for my neighbor when i looked east for lyrid meteors. from the east i saw a copper colored craft with black circles on the bottom, it was either a triangle or boomerang shape. it was h u g e,   gliding across the sky in a westerly direction. i was yelling for my neighbor to come see it but his door was closed. it moved fairly quickly across the sky toward catalina for 2 - 3 minutes then gone. 
when i first saw it i knew it was an alien craft or military vehicle. up to now i have been a skeptic, that said i have known for years that i would see a ufo in my lifetime. my very 1st thought was "oh no my phone is charging & the cameras dead.{aargh} rather than miss the event i resolved to watch it and record the details in my mind. of utmost importance to me was the color, speed, sound and flight path.  i watched until it moved out of sight into sky and city lights.
i drew a picture, but then i looked at google images and am attaching that. at first i felt fine, kinda like ok i saw a ufo i can check that off my list.  but today monday, i feel weird, nervous, and have only told my neighbor, who has his own experience. i don't think he believed me.
content.summary: 4/27/14, newport beach ca. 930p looking east for lyrid meteors i saw a very big triangular craft going nw very fast. copper color with black circles. no lites, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I am travelling on a bus with several other people on i-95 southbound. i looked out of the window near the exit to bear/glasgow and saw a grey blimp-like object rapidly descending with smoke trailing behind it. it landed in a marshy area on or near the christiana river, made a splash and may have burnt some of the reeds. i tried to get a picture but due to the speed of the bus, i could not get a good image in time. other people on the bus also saw this happen.
content.summary: Grey blimp-like object descended quickly into the christiana river, possible crash.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my garden, i was looking through my telescope and looking for stars. we were talking about stars, planets and other stuff. then my father had notice a orange light on the sw, then when my brother and i saw it. we thought it was a satalight or a planes light. 

when it got closer, it was a trangle shap, which was spining and twisting. it was hard to find at the beging because it was camouflage with the same colour of the sky. when it was moving to se. i had chage colour to orange, which before it was purple and red, which then turned to orange, and got the colour of the sky. it made no noise and it did not look like a plane as well.

there was excitment and it was wered because this was seen by use for the first time. this would be a thing that it is ture. there could be diffrent lifes the us.

we had lost sight of the object when it got further away from us.
content.summary: It was the same colour of the sky. it was trying to hide from view.

content.detailedDescription:
I have a nice balcony , after having lunch , i went there for picking the washed cloths . i wanted to rest for some time in that open area . i sat on my relaxing chair after some times i noticed that bright speedy thing in clear sky ,   
              its speed took my focus , that thing had less speed than a missile ,beside it was a dark cloud ,which helped me to see it clearly . i 
    am not a ufo keen type of person ,but since i saw it from my own eye so i thought it to share from the world ,, so that if someone else might have sen that , i would also be a proof in my area .   that thing startrd becoming smaller as it was going higher , and slowly it disappeared . i quikly came to google and found a ufo reporting sight and shared my experience.
content.summary: I got bored while sleeping ,and came to balcony and after 10 -15 minutes , i noticed that thing

content.detailedDescription:
We were coming back from late night work coming from hinton ab on hwy 16 coming towards edson, ab where it happened about 4 kilometers before town of marlobo heading east.
while driving i noticed on the north side of the highway green and red lights
low with in treeline, it was 1:45 am and it was very dark, the trees are bare no leaves as this is early spring here so i thought it was low flying airplane as they carry the green and red light,
i thought i've seen an airplane flying low on the horizon through the trees.
as i was getting closer i noticed these lights were not moving and they 
appeared bigger, it was nothing of significance to us as we thought it was perhaps some sort of tower...
finally we passed the small grove of trees and were able to have the direct visual on these lights, we've seen red, green, blue / purple light blinking sort of pulsating around quite fast,
there was also a light at the bottom like a dome light rotating a beam of white/ yellow light illuminating ground and trees.
we stopped the truck and parked on the shoulder looking at this thing and wondering what are we seeing, we got out of the truck to snap some photos with our cell phones,
the truck was put on park idling with radio playing - local hinton music radio station, we were in front of that thing with in 400 ft distance as it was just above the trees across the highway
right in front of us, it was very dark and the lights it was projecting were very bright sort of blinding us, we tried to catch this object on the camera but you could not see it in the lcd display.
i snapped 2 pictures without flash to see if i could capture something as i was looking through the pics my friend yelled that the object moved to the right abruptly,
i set up my cell phone on vide record mode and recorded the event, i finally could see the object if i zoomed on it all the way although this object was 300-400 ft in front of us
fairly large maybe 6 cars wide, i could hardly see it on my cell phone cam. i recorded about a minute of video, and we honestly got a bit freaked out , but i wanted to see it move,
so we stayed a bit longer and i noticed that the object drifted slowly to the left, i then thought that maybe that thing is projecting the lights maybe i should use cell cam flash
to signal a couple flashes as a form of communication , i got my phone again i snapped once and nothing happened, but when i sent the next flash that thing suddenly made a high pitch 2 tone sound
lasting for maybe 7 seconds, we got afraid a bit so we jumped back in the truck and decided it was time to go..., what we noticed inside the cab was a static noise of the radio,
where we pulled over to investigate the object, we were listening to hinton music station , now there  was nothing but static noise, upon that we realized we just
seen ufo wich interacted with the truck's radio, we took off rather fast leaving that thing behind , it did not attempt to follow us or either left, it just sat there over the trees.
we were quite disturbed, it was mine and my co-workers first time witnessing ufo event especially that close , we talked about that all the way to edmonton,
we stopped in edson to have a look at the photos and to our surprise we hardly had any photos on the phones..., i shot 4 pictures in total made  about a minute long video
all i have on my phone is one picture and 8 seconds video, my friend shot over 6 photos, his phone did not record a single photo.
this by far was the weirdest and most interesting experience i have ever had.
content.summary: None solid object with pulsating lights changin color ,bottom beaming white

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from a night shift job, after 8 a.M. .I was looking up in the sky while driving.It didn't bother me, to look up, distraction. and during this period of time. i was really looking up in the sky, day and night.The early 1990s to mid 90s, sorry i cant remember the year. i drove south, looked up in the sky , i seen silver , grey oval craft. came down to station above a white cloud hovered,.Then on an angle went to the right up into space.
content.summary: I was coming home from night shift work. i at this time being early 1990s mid 90s, was looking up in the sky, day and night while driving. wkday morning ,grey object came stationary above cloud left back into space tilted angle.
